pr_title: Split Hive transactional tests to separate job

timeline.bodyText: hmm ... maybe we just remove storage_formats from here?
timeline.author: findepi
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -14,7 +14,7 @@ suite_exit_code=0
 
 TESTS_HIVE_VERSION_MAJOR="3" TESTS_HIVE_VERSION_MINOR="1" presto-product-tests-launcher/bin/run-launcher test run \
    --environment singlenode-hdp3 \
-    -- -g hdp3_only,storage_formats,hive_transactional \
+    -- -g storage_formats -x hdp3_only,hive_transactional \

replies.bodyText: I saw that some tests are assigned to both storage_formats and hive_transactional test groups. With -g storage_formats in one job and -g hdp3_only,hive_transactional in another wouldn't they be executed in both?
replies.author: MiguelWeezardo

timeline.author: losipiuk
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -14,7 +14,7 @@ suite_exit_code=0
 
 TESTS_HIVE_VERSION_MAJOR="3" TESTS_HIVE_VERSION_MINOR="1" presto-product-tests-launcher/bin/run-launcher test run \
    --environment singlenode-hdp3 \
-    -- -g hdp3_only,storage_formats,hive_transactional \
+    -- -g storage_formats -x hdp3_only,hive_transactional \

replies.bodyText: I saw that some tests are assigned to both storage_formats and hive_transactional test groups. With -g storage_formats in one job and -g hdp3_only,hive_transactional in another wouldn't they be executed in both?
replies.author: MiguelWeezardo

replies.bodyText:
It seem there are no tests in both storage_formats and  hdp3_only. So we can drop hdp3_only at least from-x arg.
(Even if there was such we should use profile_specific_tests for filtering out, not hdp3_only)
replies.author: losipiuk
